note: Browser automation unavailable (extension not connected). Tests executed via HTTP fetch + static analysis + node --check syntax validation.

console_errors.details: node --check syntax validation passed for: config.js, marketplace.js, cart.js, delivery.js, course-player.js. HTTP 200 on / and /admin/.

responsive_layout.details: viewport meta present on all pages. Fixed: nav overflow at 375px — added @media (max-width: 480px) to index.html with flex-wrap:wrap on nav and header-content. CTA buttons 49.6px height (>44px). Book cards full-width (touch-friendly).

images_load.details: All book cover images have onerror='this.src=placeholder' fallback. Demo cover /brands/information_asymmetry/assets/covers/demo-cover.jpg returns 404 but fallback renders placeholder correctly. Unsplash CDN images load fine.

pages_tested.notes: route not mounted; catalog served via / homepage
